issues.description: The problem statement and class diagram refer to the price‐calculation method as calculateTotalPrice(Meal), but both the template’s Main.java and the solution’s SealSaloon class implement and invoke it as computeMealCost(Meal). This naming mismatch can confuse students when mapping the requirement to the code.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the method computeMealCost to calculateTotalPrice in SealSaloon and update all its call sites (e.g., in Main.java) to match the problem statement’s terminology.
